title: Norris's grave prediction comes true - What we learned at the Canadian GP
summary: A "stupid" accident left Norris 22 points adrift of team-mate Piastri on a Canadian GP weekend where the Briton looked faster. Here are the main takeaways from the Montreal weekend

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is Lando Norris's team-mate at McLaren?
What was the impact of the accident on Norris's points standings during the Canadian GP weekend?
In which city did the Canadian Grand Prix take place?
